name: fastled-wasm-mcp-server
description: MCP Server configuration for FastLED WASM project

python_execution.rule: ALWAYS use 'uv run' instead of 'python' or 'python3'
python_execution.rationale: This project uses uv for Python package and environment management. Direct python/python3 usage may use wrong version or miss dependencies.

testing.rule: Run unit tests with 'bash test' as per user rules
testing.note: Manual testing should still use 'uv run' prefix for Python commands

actions: Warn when 'python' or 'python3' is used directly
Suggest 'uv run' alternative for all Python execution
Update existing scripts to use 'uv run' prefix
Emphasize 'uv run' in documentation and examples

allowed_python_usage: In configuration files specifying Python version
In Dockerfiles where uv is not available
In CI/CD where setup-python action is used
